channel.title: Internal Cell Devices – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: VooPoo Drag Nano Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: WOW-GREAT PRICE! The Gene POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!
item.content:encoded:
VooPoo’s first pod system is a huge brake through… In a tiny package!

The Drag Nano Pod Kit is born, VooPoo’s tiny pod system is just 44g! the lightweight and portable pod kit is enjoyable anytime and anywhere! The Drag Nano’s intelligent cold boot mode is for an extreme flavor experience immediately on the first puff. The intelligent power output balance is fantastic for e-Liquid flavors as always. The Drag Nano’s 750mAh battery capacity can power about 350 puffs and can be charged in about an hour! Along for the ride is the new Gene.POD Chip adjusted more than 40 times with more than 200 flavor testers involved.

The Gene.POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!

Kit Features: 

  • Dimension: 54.5*35*11mm
  • Battery: On-Board 750mAh
  • Material: Zinc Alloy & Aluminum Alloy
  • Weight: 44G
  • Voltage Output: 3.2-4.2V
  • Charge Voltage: 5V/0.5A
  • Quiescent Current: <15uA
  • Pod Capacity: 1ml
  • Resistance: 1.8ohms
  • Material: PCTG
  • Size: 36.3*15*7.0mm

Package Contents:

  • 1x Drag Nano
  • 1x Nano Pod
  • 1x USB Cable
  • 1x Warranty Card
  • 1x GENE CHIP Card

item.title: DazzVape Daze One
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Three adjustable voltage settings to provide multiple options for different users.
item.content:encoded:
The Dazzvape Daze One Mod is powered by a 550mAh built-in battery. The device has three adjustable voltage settings to provide multiple options for different users. The Daze one will fit all 510 threaded cartridges with a diameter of 12mm or less.

Product Specifications:

  • Thread: 510
  • Size: 48* 31* 18mm
  • Battery: 550mAh built-in battery
  • 15 second preheat
  • built-in 550mah battery

In the Package

  • 1 x Daze One Device
  • 1 x USB Cable

item.title: Youup Magig Stick
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Easy to use pen battery with an adjustable voltage dial on the bottom.
item.content:encoded:
The Youup Magig stick is an easy to use pen battery with an adjustable voltage dial on the bottom. With its simple pre-heat feature your cartridge or tank will be ready to vape in no time.

Specifications:

  • Voltage output: 3.3-4.8V.
  • Battery capacity: 450mAh
  • 10 Second hit cut off timer

Product Contains:

  • 1 x USB Charger
  • 1 x Magig Stick Device
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: DazzVape Twist 350
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Overcharge protection, 10 second cutoff, short circuit protection & low battery protection!
item.content:encoded:
DAZZVAPE Twist pen battery incorporates 15 seconds preheat mode (2V) and variable voltage settings range from 2.0V to 4.0V, which is great for anyone just starting to get into essential and alternative e-liquids. It fits all 510 threaded cartridges and has great endurance with a battery capacity of 350mAh. Slim while powerful, it is an incredible vape pen battery you’ve been looking for!

Product Specifications:

  • Battery: 350 mAh
  • Dimenstions: 92mm x 11.2mm
  • Protections: Overcharge protection, 10 second cutoff, short circuit protection, low battery protection
  • Charging Time: 1 hour
  • Thread: 510

In the Package:

  • 1 x Twist Device
  • 1 x Charger

item.title: Smok Mi Care
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Specially designed device for high viscosity liquids!
item.content:encoded:
MI CARE is a specially designed device for high viscosity liquids, it has built-in 700mAh battery to provide long vaping time, adjustable voltage to offer different vaping effects. Vibration function and LED design shows the using status. It is also designed with 10 second-preheat function, which can perfectly liquefy the oil and offer excellent taste.

FANCY DESIGN – MICARE is a compact and exquisite device, it shaped like an old-school lighter but with a fancy appearance, glossy finish and sleek cobra/resin. Hold it in your hand, you will know what masterpiece means.

Specifications:

  • Size: 56mm x 43mm x 14.8mm
  • Weight: 69g
  • Battery Capacity: 700mAh
  • Standby Current: <50uA
  • Input Voltage: 3.3V-4.2V
  • Output Voltage: 3.0V-4.1V
  • Output Wattage: 5W-25W
  • Charging Current: Max 0.4A
  • Charging Voltage: 5V
  • Preheating Output: 1.3W
  • Overcharge Voltage: 4.3V
  • Over Discharge Voltage: 2.4V
  • Overcharge Current: 1.0A

VIBRATION – MICARE is designed with a vibration function. Vibrate once when a cartridge is inserted as well as when preheating is finished. Three times vibration when one inhale exceeds 8 seconds.

INTELLIGENT LED INDICATOR – There’s am LED light at the left side of the device, it will show blue, green, orange, or red light when you’re vaping. Press button once to change the voltage and the LED will show different colors to indicate the current voltage level.

  • Blue – 3.4V
  • Green – 3.6V
  • Orange – 3.8V
  • Red – 4.0V

PREHEATING FUNCTION MAKES EVERY PUFF WONDERFUL – MICARE has a function of preheating. Fast press the button for two times then the device would start to preheat for ten seconds. Preheating can accelerate the process of liquefying and help to get better taste. If you want to stop preheating, you just need to press the button for one time; and if you vape during the preheating process, the preheating would stop automatically.

OPERATION – To enjoy cozy vaping with MICARE, inhale is all the operation you need to do. But if you were in a cold place, you’d better press the side-button first to preheat , this step can help to offer better taste.

SMALL BODY; BIG CAPACITY – MICARE is extremely excellent, 700mAh capacity to provide you with all day vaping experience and denser clouds.

PORTABLE SIZE LANYARD INCLUDED – Perfect size and contoured shape provides you comfort grab feel. A lanyard is available in the package. Wherever you go, it can be a good company or switch it out with a Cloud Chemistry Lanyard!

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x MICARE Device
  • 1 x Lanyard
  • 2 x Adapter
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: Vaptio Ironclad Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
*SMOK BABY BEAST COMPATIBLE*

IronClad Frogman C Tank Kit by VAPTIO

IronClad, a compact and trendy shaped kit from Vaptio, has an all-in-one button for easy switch on/off and vaping. Combining a built-in 2600mAh built-in battery and a huge 6mL capacity tank, it offers longer vaping enjoyment and massive clouds. Mesh/Strip Coils are available for various tastes. Creative LED RBG lights clearly show the battery’s state of charge. Its leak-proof electrode frees you from risks of short-circuit and liquid leak. This is the IronClad, the symbol of simplest and purest vaping.

Specifications:

  • Tank Size: 24.5mm x 52mm
  • Tank Capacity: 6.0mL
  • Resistance Range: 0.2 Ohms
  • Frogman M1 Coil (0.2 ohm, DL, Mesh)
  • Frogman T1 Coil (0.2 ohms, DL, Strip)
  • Mod Size: 45mm x 26mm x 79mm
  • Battery Capacity: 2600mAh
  • Output Power: 50W (max)
  • Output Voltage: 2.8-4.2V (max)
  • Output Current: 25A (max)

PROTECTION – Everyone needs protection, let us protect you.

  • over-vaping, short circuit, low voltage, and over-heat protection

ALL-IN-ONE BUTTON, LED INDICATOR – Easy switch on/off and vaping with an all-in-one button. LED RBG lights indicate the state of the charge. Blue light indicates that there is 70%~100% battery life remaining, a Green light indicates that there is 30%~69% battery life remaining, and then a Red light indicates the device has a low battery life with only 1%~29% remaining.

PATENTED ANTI-LEAK TECHNOLOGY – Newly patented anti-leak design protects your mod circuitry from the rare occasional times your tank may leak.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x IronClad Mod
  • 1 x Frogman C Tank (SMOK Baby Beast Coil Compatible)
  • 1 x Frogman M1 0.2 Ohm Mesh Coil (pre-installed)
  • 1 x Frogman T1 0.2 Ohm Strip Coil
  • 2 x User Manuals
  • Spare Parts

item.title: Smok Q-Box
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK Q-BOX 50W TC is the compact revolutionary system from SMOKTech’s incredible output line-up, presenting a compact box mod designs with ample performance. The Q-BOX 50W is designed with discrete form factor in-mind, featuring a standard box mod structure with streamlined details for everyday usage. Constructed out of durable Zinc Alloy, the QBOX is built for pocket-friendly handling. The compact system integrates a vibrant and data rich 0.96 Inch OLED display, providing an intuitive operational interface at the epicenter of the device. The built-in 1600mAh rechargeable battery offers incredible battery life throughout the day, with quick charge function that can fully charge the device within 2 hours. Output offers a range of 1 to 50W, complete a suite of intelligent functionalities and safety protections. Entering the market with a user-friendly system with comprehensive performance capability, the SMOK QBox 50W is a quintessential featured set in its market segment.

 

SMOKTech Q-BOX 50W TC Box Mod Features:

  • Dimensions: 54.8mm by 33.57mm by 25mm
  • Integrated 1600mh Rechargeable Battery
  • Wattage Output Range: 6-50W
  • Voltage Output Range: 0.1-9V
  • Min Atomizer Resistance: 0.06ohm
  • Temperature Range: 200-600F
  • Support Ni200 Nickel, Titanium, and Stainless Steel Heating Elements
  • Premium Zinc Alloy Construction
  • Full-Matrix 0.96 Inch OLED Display
  • Oversized Firing Botton
  • Ergonomically Placed Adjustment Buttons
  • Intelligent Atomizer Recognition
  • Puff Monitoring System
  • 12 Seconds Cut-Off
  • Short Circuit Protection
  • Overheat Protection
  • Low Battery Warning
  • 510 Connection

Includes:

  • 1 QBOX 50W Mod
  • 1 MicroUSB Cable
  • Instructional Manual

item.title: Eleaf iStick Rim
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Built-in 3000mAh battery stocked with a Type-C charging port with QC3.0 "40 min" fast charge
item.content:encoded:
The Eleaf iStick Rim is coming with its elegant appearance. The Eleaf iStick Rim comes with an inbuilt 3000mAh battery while providing an all-day-long vaping experience to users. The IML technology makes the Eleaf iStick Rim mod so outstanding in appearance. The anti-dry-burn mechanism of Eleaf iStick Rim will ensure a safe vape too. The innovative QC3.0 quick charge system makes the Eleaf iStick Rim MOD a real advanced device with 40 minutes charging time.

Specs:

Eleaf iStick Rim MOD

  • Size: 30.3 x 36 x 80mm
  • Battery type: Built-in 3000mAh
  • Output wattage: 80W max
  • Resistance range: 0.05-3.0ohm
  • Charging time: 40min
  • Charging port: Type-C
  • Thread: 510

Features:

  • Built-in 3000mAh battery for all-day-long vape
  • Type-C charging port with QC3.0 fast charge
  • Distinctive in Molding Label(IML) Technology
  • Optimal flavor and massive cloud
  • Top childproof structure for protection
  • Bottom anti-leak e-liquid lock system
  • New EC SS316L mesh coil
  • Innovative dry-burn protection
  • Easy top filling & Adjustable bottom airflow control

Includes:

  • 1 x iStick Rim Battery
  • 1 x QC3.0 USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: Aegis Mini
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Waterproof, shockproof and dust proof while stocked with a 2200mAh built-in battery
item.content:encoded:
The GeekVape Aegis Mini Mod is designed to be the most durable mod with extreme water, shock and dust protections. This mini beast is equipped with the advanced AS chipset, it powers from 5W to 80W and produces an outstanding power output accuracy in both power mode and temperature control mode.The mixture of alloy, leather and SLI silicon provides intense durability and great ergonomics. It is very compact and built in with a reliable 2200mAh battery.

Mod Features:

  • Waterproof, shockproof and dust proof
  • Long lasting 2000mAh built-in battery with 80W max output
  • Supports TC control for Stainless Steel, Nickel 200 and Titanium
  • 2A fast charging, which can charge up to 80% in just 20 minutes
  • 78mm in height
  • 2200mAh built-in battery
  • Wattage range: 5- 80W
  • Support resistance: 0.05- 3.0ohm
  • Temp range: 100- 300℃/ 200- 600℉

Package Contents:

  • 1x Aegis Mini Box Mod
  • 1x USB Cable
  • 1x User Manual

item.title: Eleaf Amnis 2
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Long-lasting 1100mAh battery utilizing a USB Type-C Cable
item.content:encoded:
Introducing the new iStick Amnis 2. Combining a simple, gorgeous and inventive design, iStick Amnis 2 packs all the functionalities in a minimalist design. It comes with a variety of stunning colors offering you a large choice.User-Friendly and Adjustable Power Modes – To select a power mode, you only need to press the Power Control Button to switch between all the 5 modes available.

  • 1100mAh Built-in Battery – Minimalist design but big on battery, iStick Amnis 2 is built with a long-lasting 1100mAh battery.
  • Intuitive Battery Life Indicators – Battery life can easily be noticed by a simple glance at the LED light around the fire button.
      • Red – 0% to 20%
      • Blue 20% to 60%
      • Green 60% to 100%
  • Big Battery Comes with USB Type-C – With USB Type-C, your charging of iStick Amnis 2 becomes easier.

Specifications:

  • Size: 36mm x 19.5mm x 120mm
  • Weight: 124g
  • Battery Capacity: 1100mAh
  • Resistance Range: 0.3Ω-3Ω
  • Wattage: 23W Max
  • Ultra-Portable – With its small size and a lanyard made especially for iStick Amnis 2, it’s easy to carry it everywhere you go and vape instantly.

Kit Contents:

  • 1 x iStick Amnis 2
  • 1 x USB Type-C Cable
  • 1 x Lanyard
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card
